name: SharonInformation
0:
”Alexa ask Sharon Info if there's recycling today for 100 Bird Lane”
”Alexa ask Sharon Info what color is recycling this week”
”Alexa ask Sharon Info if next week is a recycling week”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sharon info
des: This skill will eventually give you all sorts of local information about the town of Sharon. The first thing it knows about is the town recycling schedule. You can ask about a particular street, a particular house number on that street, or just ask about what recycling color it is. If you use a street (with or without a number), Alexa will remember the last one you specified so next time you can ask without it.
